prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a blue fish with yellow stripes and big ears.
Imagine a small, serpent-like Pokemon with a bright yellow body and teal accents.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique design, featuring a long, squiggly shape and friendly expression.
Design a cute, normal-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and a tail that resembles a fin.
Show me a Pokemon that has a blend of yellow and blue colors, making it stand out in any environment.
Make a Pokemon that appears cheerful and often hides in grassy areas, waiting for its chance to surprise trainers.
Give me a Pokemon with a whimsical design, combining aquatic and terrestrial elements for a versatile look.

distinctive_features: Small fins at the end of the tail
